holidays.title: National Chocolate Covered Anything Day
holidays.description: What do BBQ potato chips, strawberries, and ants have in common?

holidays.title: National Ugly Sweater Day
holidays.description: One thing's for sure — this holiday will certainly have you laughing all day long!

holidays.title: Bahrain National Day
holidays.description: Today, we honor the Bahrainis and their stories. So go ahead and bring out the biryani!

holidays.title: Bangladesh Victory Day
holidays.description: Want to learn why Bangladesh Victory Day is one of the most victorious days in history?

holidays.title: Barbie And Barney Backlash Day
holidays.description: Let's just forget about Barbie and Barney for a while.

holidays.title: Day of Reconciliation
holidays.description: The Day of Reconciliation has helped bring harmony to a region still after decades of injustice.

holidays.title: Kazakhstan Independence Day
holidays.description: Ready to celebrate the Independence Day of Kazakhstan for two days? Do it like Kazakhs do!

holidays.title: National Underdog Day
holidays.description: Sit back, relax, and enjoy the way we celebrate these unrecognized heroes.

holidays.title: Stupid Toy Day
holidays.description: Did you spend eight hours a day sustaining the lives of Tamagotchis? Happy Stupid Toy Day!

holidays.title: Underdog Day
holidays.description: Join us as we cheer those who give it their best but do not emerge victorious.

holidays.title: Vijay Diwas
holidays.description: Indian Armed Forces, veterans, and citizens, pay tribute to and remember the sacrifices of their soldiers.

holidays.title: Alana Kern’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young star is only just beginning her journey and has a bright future ahead.

holidays.title: Berleezy’s Birthday
holidays.description: How well do you know this American YouTuber, actor, and social media personality?

holidays.title: Bill Hicks’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the wonderful life and times of Bill Hicks on his birthday.

holidays.title: Billy Gibbons’s Birthday
holidays.description: He's a legendary guitarist who needs no introductions — let's celebrate his talent and birthday!

holidays.title: Daniel Preda’s Birthday
holidays.description: Celebrate the birthday of this iconic fashion influencer, model, and actor — Daniel Preda!

holidays.title: Ethan Dolan’s Birthday
holidays.description: Dolan, along with his brother Grayson, is building a social media empire!

holidays.title: Grayson Dolan’s Birthday
holidays.description: Find out about Grayson Dolan's age, girlfriend, family, biography, and more today!

holidays.title: Hozumi Hasegawa’s Birthday
holidays.description: We have plenty of interesting facts on retired boxing legend Hozumi Hasegawa!

holidays.title: James Reynolds’s Birthday
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate the birthday of the young Reynolds, a future star.

holidays.title: Jane Austen’s Birthday
holidays.description: Jane Austen was a visionary — well ahead of her time. Here’s why we think so!

holidays.title: Kai Cenat’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s get to know the famous social media content creator a bit better.

holidays.title: Ludwig van Beethoven’s Birthday
holidays.description: Still regarded as one of the most famous composers to date, we delve into his life.

holidays.title: Park Seo-joon’s Birthday
holidays.description: His parents were reluctant to send him to acting school because he was a weak student.

holidays.title: Theo James’s Birthday
holidays.description: James, who has achieved so much already, presses on and pushes forward toward excellence.

holidays.title: Zara Larsson’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this talented vocalist, pursuing her dreams is all she needs to secure the bag.
